attributes.action: Immediately cease lobbying the US government to have anti-ballistic missle systems based in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is reported that the Prime Minister has been lobbying President Bush to have components of their anti-ballistic missile system (Star Wars system) based in this country. This programme was suspended following an agreement with the Soviet government which was then torn up by G W Bush.
The people of this country are sick of watching our independence being gradually sold out to the US by a succession of governments since WW2.
We demand this government stand for something we have had for more than one thousand years; British Independence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
